data.eml:eml: New data on the genus Ascaphium Lewis (Coleoptera, staphylinidae, Scaphidiinae) of China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article He, Wen-Jia, Tang, Liang, Li, Li-Zhen (2008): New data on the genus Ascaphium Lewis (Coleoptera, staphylinidae, Scaphidiinae) of China. Zootaxa 1923: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184753
